import React, { useRef, useState } from 'react'; import './Contact.css'; function Contact() { const [status, setStatus] = useState("Submit"); const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setStatus("Sending..."); const { name, subject, email, message } = e.target.elements; let details = { name: name.value, subject: subject.value, email: email.value, message: message.value, }; let response = await fetch("http://localhost:3080/contact", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json;charset=utf-8", }, body: JSON.stringify(details), }); setStatus("Submit"); let result = await response.json(); alert(result.status); }; return (
